name: They Say Opposites Attract
description:
Short exploratory game created for a college assignment and based around the theme of 'Opposites'. My interpretation of the theme was to explore daily life when living with your polar opposite. The game was made in one week and takes approximately 5 minutes to playthrough.

'They Say Opposites Attract' was featured on Warp Door on the 14th of February 2016

» http://warpdoor.com/2016/02/14/they-say-opposites-...

My games can also be found on my website

Any and all feedback is welcome - @VRuttle

Cheers,

Vikki =]

Controls:

» Move left and right in the scene using A & D

» Move back and forth in the scene using W & S

» Text popups will be scattered throughout the game so have a walk around and find them all
